name: Fitu App
description:
Fitu App allows you to discover and instantly book amazing fitness experiences near you.

------
Here's the deal:

1. Fitness providers give us their unsold spots.

2. We show you the best workouts near you.

3. You book a deal in a single click and get fit your way.
--------
No monthly contracts
Simply pay for what you use!
--------
Discover over 7,000 different weekly activities in London

team.name: Rodrigo Contreras
team.bioHtml:
On a personal and professional mission to help people to stay active and meet active people. 
Co-founder of Fitu app.

team.name: Koen van den Heuvel
team.bioHtml: Founder @Fitu App

team.name: Ismael Rodriguez
team.bioHtml: Full stack Developer with 12 years	of experience in	multiple technologies, worked for the government	and private companies, self taught and	teacher.

On a personal and professional mission to help people to stay active and meet active people. 
Co-founder of Fitu app.

jobs.title: Videographer and Photographer
jobs.description:
We’re on a mission to bring much-needed flexibility to the fitness industry, giving you the freedom and convenience to book any physical activity that is happening around you, without the need for a membership!

Fitu finds fitness activities for you, which you didn’t even know existed, giving you full access to what the city has to offer. Think activities like, disco yoga, outdoor bootcamps, salsa classes, kickboxing and so much more! 

In a short period of time, we’ve managed to partner up with over 180 London fitness studios, gyms and trainers.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Please apply by sending your motivational letter and CV attached*

We’re looking for a content creator/videographer/video editor/photographer/photo editor intern to join our young and vibrant team. You’ll be in charge of the creative side of our brand, filming and photographing the studios and workouts of our partners and our events. Your content will be distributed on all of our channels (in-app, social media, video, website, email etc.) You’ll get the chance to work closely with the founders in many different marketing areas. 

What you’ll be doing:
•	You’ll be in control of our photo and video content. Giving you the full flexibility to think of new and creative ways to interact with our audience on behalf of Fitu
•	Filming our partners’ workouts, interviewing trainers and film our bespoke events
•	Photographing our partners’ workouts, interviewing trainers and film our events
•	Editing videos and photos
•	Create graphic design/videos for our marketing campaigns
•	Create graphic design for all our website and social media
•	Marketing support and development of new campaigns

You’ll enjoy this role if you:
•	Photo and video editing skills
•	Photographing & Filming skills
•	Have an interest in health and fitness
•	Would like to be part of an ambitious startup at an early stage
•	An understanding of social media management
•	Like to work in a small, young and fast-paced team
•	Like flexible working hours


Please note this is an unpaid internship. We offer flexible working hours, we cover all expenses and you get the chance to try the most amazing workouts in the city, free of charge.
